body_html: Hmm, just noticed this comment saying a MonitoredSession cannot be set as the default session. No mention of why though. Perhaps there's some unspecified assumption that this PR would break?
body_text: Hmm, just noticed this comment saying a MonitoredSession cannot be set as the default session. No mention of why though. Perhaps there's some unspecified assumption that this PR would break?
body: Hmm, just noticed [this comment](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/monitored_session.py#L649) saying a `MonitoredSession` cannot be set as the default session. No mention of _why_ though. Perhaps there's some unspecified assumption that this PR would break?
